name: JobTrain
description: Free career training with 90%+ job placement in healthcare, culinary, tech, and construction
fullDescription: JobTrain provides free career training in high-demand fields including healthcare, culinary arts, technology, and construction for low-income Bay Area residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free career training programs (8-16 weeks)
- Healthcare certifications (CNA, Medical Assistant, Phlebotomy)
- Culinary arts and food service training
- Construction and green energy training
- IT and digital skills training
- Job placement assistance (90%+ placement rate)
- Supportive services (childcare, transportation, emergency funds)
howToGetIt:
1. Must be low-income (specific guidelines apply)
2. Must be at least 18 years old
3. Attend information session
4. Complete application and interview
5. Start training program
6. Receive job placement support upon completion
keywords: JobTrain, Menlo Park, job training, career, healthcare, culinary, IT, construction, certificate, low-income
